MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH52 postcode area of Broxburn. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:22pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing fault investigations and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:20am on 14th March.
